It pays to share the sun.
Now through August 1st, share your unique referral code and the URL listed below with your local friends and neighbors.
For every friend who becomes a BlueWave community solar customer using your code, you’ll get a $100 American Express gift card from us; they’ll get a $100 American Express gift card from us.
After all, good things should come to those who share in saving the planet.
We want to give you $100 for each new BlueWave community solar customer you refer (and them $100 too).
YOUR REFERRAL CODE (case sensitive) {!Contact.Referral_Code__c}
Use at: www.bluewavesolar.com/community
SHARE YOUR REFERRAL CODE
Stay tuned for more BlueWave offers coming your way. And thank you for sharing!
P.S. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com or (844) 786-4100. We’re happy to help.
